param.name: POLYPOINTS
param.dialogReference:
Hull Construction

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] one hull for all shapes

[1] one hull per shape

[2] one hull per shape part

Default: 1

This option does not apply to simple point layers.

param.name: POLYGONCVX
param.dialogReference:
Polygon Convexity

Boolean

Default: 0

Describes a polygon's compactness as ratio of its area to its hull's area.

tool.summary: Implementation of 'Andrew's Monotone Chain Algorithm' for convex hull construction.
